metaTitle: 108 Leonard | Eleven exclusive homes from The Crown Collection | NYC
metaDescription: Eleven one-of-a-kind homes that offer owners the most desirable amenities of a city residence: theatrical volumes, grand master suites, cosseting fireplaces and majestic vistas.

intro.title: The Crown Collection
intro.para: Perched atop the handsomely restored neoclassical building stands an exclusive portfolio of eleven unparalleled residences. These penthouses offer the most desirable attributes: theatrical volumes, majestic vistas, grand master suites and many have romantic fireplaces. Extraordinary ceiling heights up to over 16 feet are paired with dramatic soaring windows framing shimmering panoramas.
